body: @TH456 that is so true the MC is going on a date with her and when he confessed to her, she is annoying him until he apologized for confession and she decided to tell him to meet her in the empty room so he find out the truth what her real attention at. That so dumb

NTR has been overused, full of generic stuff for quite a while already, way past it's saturation, it'll always be new to some of the newer readers (they don't go digging old stuff until after they've read enough). So just enjoy the art and use this as fap material.
At least that whore didnt want to date him cause she know, better than the whores who still date someone, these ones should be killed even if you go in prison after 😂😂😂😂
He didnt even look sad lmao the guy
Ntr plot is getting more and more overused,  Well yeah I love Ntr the most than other tags. But mehhh this is just another story of a girl that would spread her legs just bc of seeing big dick.
I like ntr but nahhh this is too generic. Come on

looks like the generic bully NTR. i bet bully blackmailes Fmc he would stop bullying mc for her body fmc sacrifices her body to protect mc then towards the end mc probs confessed they bout to kiss then she probably thinks shes not worthy of mc cause of the stuff shes done while at the same time already fallen for the dick

kind of sad how the industry seems to be going, a lot of new artists seem to just throw the NTR tag in the title/cover to get easy clicks on their work, and this just leads to the laziest stories ever because they know NTR lovers are just going to eat it up. Like I enjoy NTR from time to time but when  stories are just getting dumber and dumber its really hard to enjoy something.
